name: Against the House
description: You've returned to a wartorn future where authorities have given up on winning the war--rather, they want to ensure this future never comes to pass! Can you find the spark that ignited the Tholian Assembly?
rules:
-- Unique Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of EMH, K. Archer, Obrist, Caregivers, Warp Theorists, or Suspiria will provide a bonus to Supply Missions.
-- Every Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are only available during Phase 1. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: EMH, K. Archer, Obrist, Caregivers, Warp Theorists or Suspiria
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Supply Missions!

adventures.name: Arts and Culture
adventures.description: Look for anti-Federation sentiment in Tholian arts.

adventures.name: Editorial Section
adventures.description: Separate propaganda or opinion from fact.

adventures.name: Classifieds
adventures.description: Determine if Section 31 was acting against the Tholians.

adventures.name: Krenim Time Ship
adventures.description: Aid Obrist's research into the past.

next_threshold_rewards.name: Chronitons
next_threshold_rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

screens.text: "Welcome back, Captain. Thanks to you, we've forced the Tholians to retreat for now and regroup--but they'll be back. And we have no clear path to victory."
"I've seen more casualties than any doctor ever should. If we can't win this war, then I suggest we find a way to ensure it never happens."
"You can help us, Captain. Many records were lost to destruction or propaganda. We need to know exactly what was happening in your time. Help us reconstruct the past."

responses.text: "No surprise. Kes even warned me about her."
"Perfect. When I'm returned to my own time, I'll take care of her."
"Are you certain? Maybe she's just a red herring?"

screens.text: "I don't know if this comes as a surprise, but we've traced the Tholian Assembly's designs on the Federation back to your first encounter with Suspiria--the Nacene being."
"How would she have known? Why would she reach out to you in particular? Every minor detail of this historical event may be important."
"No! Please, trust me, my people have experience in chronological warfare. If you act hastily, it could bring about an even worse future than the one we're in."
"We don't know that Suspiria's actions triggered war with the Tholians. We only know that they began to plot the first blow around the same time. We need more information."

"The Krenim have the technology to adjust history, so to speak--but to change it, we first need to understand it. Help my people gather what we need, and I can determine the exact moment this future was born."
